title: Samurai Shodown – v2.31 + 11 DLCs
body:
Samurai Shodown – v2.31 + 11 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Fighting, Side, 3D
Company: SNK
Languages: ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 38.2 GB
Repack Size: from 14.1 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Epic Store v2.31 release: 38.2 GB, thanks to valtrix1982!
  • Nemirtingas EpicEmu applied over
  • 11 DLCs are included and activated (one more is planned in the Season Pass 3 set)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (ONLY when installed with credits video)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of credits video
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 38.2 to 14.1/14.6 GB)
  • Installation takes 15-25 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 38.2 GB (42.4 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

SAMURAI SHODOWN has enjoyed worldwide success as a blade-wielding fighting game series since its first release in 1993. Over 10 years have passed since the last series installment, and it is now time for SAMURAI SHODOWN to return in a brand-new game featuring high-end visuals and gameplay! With its story set one year before the very first installment, warriors and combatants from various backgrounds and with their own goals are about to battle to fulfill their destinies!

Carrying on the Legacy
Faithfully reproducing the game mechanics and atmosphere that contributed to the success of the series, the new game aims to bring the same tense and exhilarating battles that the series is known for. Intense and epic battles are back!

Evolving the Presentation
Using the power of UNREAL® ENGINE 4, the series is able to achieve a level of detail never before seen for a totally new visual experience!

Included DLCs

  • RIMURURU
  • BASARA
  • KAZUKI KAZAMA
  • WAN-FU
  • MINA MAJIKINA
  • SOGETSU KAZAMA
  • IROHA
  • WARDEN
  • CHAM CHAM
  • HIBIKI TAKANE
  • SHIRO TOKISADA AMAKUSA

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is slightly backwards compatible with my previous SS repack. You can rehash fg-optional-credits.bin to save 492 MB of traffic.
